results.title: Staving Off G.O.P. Attacks, Democrats Show New Urgency on Crime
results.abstract: A strong showing by Eric Adams in the New York mayoral race and President Biden’s announcement of a new crime-fighting agenda signal a shift by Democrats toward themes of public safety.

multimedia.caption: Eric Adams, a former police officer and a Democratic candidate for New York City mayor, has denounced “Defund the Police” activists as a collection of affluent whites.
multimedia.copyright: Sarah Blesener for The New York Times
